title: Instagram update lets users like Stories without sending a DM
content:
Instagram on Monday announced a new feature called “Private Story Likes” that will change how users interact with other people’s Stories. Starting today, users who receive the update will be able to like someone’s Stories without sending a DM.

more…

The post Instagram update lets users like Stories without sending a DM appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: With the new "Private Story Likes" feature, Instagram users will be able to like someone's Stories without sending a DM.
